reviews.sentence: Great staff terrible quality hotel. The rooms are in desperate need of a renovation. They advertise a fitness center but what equipment they have is run down old and broken. It was a joke. On a positive front the staff were all great and very helpful.

Good Value in Summer. Low room rates during summer months provide good value. This hotel is comfortable and clean but housekeeping needs greater consistency. Basic cable channels are provided but no option for on demand movies however high speed internet works well. Continental and Full breakfast are uninspired and hotel priced. No room service during slower summer months. Convenient location at I10 and Chandler Road close to shopping and a variety of restaurants within 1 2 miles. Better ventilation in the elevator its hot and stuffy.

Stay in Phoenix for funeral. This is a older hotel but was clean and the staff was excellent. Bed was a sleep comfort and adjustable but was not for me or my wife. The first room we were given was used as a storage and the staff at the desk made it right and was as helpful as could be. The only problems we had was drain in tub and toilet was slow. Tub would back up while showering and had to flush at least 2 times and one day the door card would not work and the staff on duty that day acted like we were bothering her. The only other thing was room had no fridge or micro wave. Micro wave does not matter to me but a fridge would have been nice. Staff was great in all area restaurant bar and house keeping except for one day. Great location for east side of the city. Easy on and easy off the freeway. A long way to the phoenix downtown Would have been nice to have fridge in room and complementary cofe in lobby in the morning.
Nice size. Overall we were satisfied. The only thing we did not like is no bathtub. But we could live for only one night. Their customer service was pretty good.

Weighing the good and the bad. I made a last minute trip and my accommodations fell through so I went online and chose an undisclosed 3 star hotel in Chandler for a deeply discounted rate while on was shuttling from the airport to the rental car desk. Quick and easy. The afordability was key. When I arrived at the hotel it was easy to find and had ample free parking. Reception was pleasant and I was directed to a room on the third floor. The unexpected bonus was that this room and most likely all are two room junior suites. Though it looks like it has been without much updating over the past few years it was fine. Brand hotels have a tendency to mandate new amenities that may or may not truly enhance the experience. This room had a sleep member bed. I tried numerous settings and now know that it is not really for me. They also had an i home alarm clock and docking station that was unplugged. I have an android and most likely so did the prior guest. There are no usb ports bedside so I followed suit and used the outlet for my charger. The main concern I had was finding half used amenities in the bathroom mouthwash lotion. I took them to the desk and they were very responsive. However later I also found sodas and waters in the fridge left by the previous guest. I asked to have the bed changed just in case that guest left earlier than expected. Housekeeping took care of it and the manager even left a voice message which was a nice touch. My point is not to focus on the missteps but on the way the hotel responded. That is key. Each associate responded with concern and made efforts immediately to correct the situation. It is less important to me that everything is perfect in a hotel than how the staff responds when challenges arise. The people at this hotel deserve that praise.
Staff was great and courteous upon check in. Gym was horrible no refrigerator no microwave and no complimentary breakfast which is not what I expected for the 3 star.

My room a single king was large and comfortable a separate living area that could be closed off from the bedroom. Close to the pool. Pool is inside a courtyard area and safe from vagrants. Hotel staff is very accommodating and had no problem allowing me a late check out. Close to decent restaurants and shopping as well as I10 and Sky Harbor. The pool area is quite nice with chairs and towels provided. The in room furnishings could be updated. The couch in my room had stains wear marks on the cushions.

would not give me my security deposit back cause they said my room smelled like cigarettes. But the whole second floor smelled like bud. I already know they were trying to take advance of me cause I am a young guest. But that was uncaled for especially since they had no proof. Never staying there again.

Location and ease on off freeway. The air conditioner barely worked. We asked to have it fixed or switch rooms. They said it was fixed but it was not. We had it set at 60 all day long and it still was hotter in the room than in the hallway.

The renovation is underway and the website is Misleading. Yes the place is under remodeling but rooms are available. Incomplete dusty rooms with old furniture. The images gallery in the website might be misleading at this point and there is no comfort here. Unles someone need a room just to arrive late in the dark sneaking through a side door and register at a temporary welcome desk setup just sleep and get back on the road before the dawn this is not a place to stay during this remodeling. However the two employees helped me are very nice and done a great service.

New Hotel Doubletree. Great new hotel right off I10. Always stayed in this area and was curious about the new Hilton property I was very pleasantly surprised with this hotel. Great location for me I was upgraded to a 2 room suite. The hotel was very well run and I enjoyed my stay nice restaurant with a full breakfast and dinner menu. Large bar if you are interested I will stay here again as long as the price is reasonable which it was.

Excellent and Quiet. Stayed here on business and this hotel is clean fresh and extremely quiet. My first two nights I thought I was the only guest staying here it was so quiet. Love the huge TVs alsoBreakfast was great and included as I am a Gold member. A few suggestions for breakfast. Skip the wateful individual ketchup bottles. None of us are millionaires or NFL team owners who need this. I spent half my breakfast trying to get the seal off. And while you have two urns of regular coffee why not one for decaf. Weird I had to ask and wait for a decaf. Again loved this hotel and will be back when in the area.

Adequate Doubletree. Staff was friendly. Room and bathroom were fine. Breakfast was more limited for those who do n’t want hot. One flavor of yogurt. parfait is more environmentally friendly for less plastic but not great for those of us who want more choices like plain no fruit or build your own.

Nice and new. The hotel was large and airy with a modern flair. The young lady at the front desk was helpful and welcoming. The rooms were sparkling clean and good sized. Thank goodness no barn doors on the bathroom for this renovation. We were cozy and comfortable in our room. Breakfast left a lot to be desired though. The nice lady at the counter seem a little flustered when I asked where the hot tea was. She brought me out some hot water and tea bags but all the tea on hand was herbal no breakfast tea. The bread choices were sparse and fairly unappealing. The fruit mix looked like it had sat out overnight. In short a nice new clean hotel with comfortable rooms but I recommend heading to a First Watch or Cracker Barrel for breakfast.

Fantastic location. This was a great place to stay. Convenient to locations for meals and freeway access. The staff was helpful and accommodating to our needs quick access to a conference room for an unexpected meeting.

Best Stay for an affordable price. The staff was great. Jef did an amazing job checking us in and telling us about our stat. Offering us cookies on the way in and out. Everyone we interacted with was courteous and helpful. The room was clean and a perfect size. The bathroom was well stocked the shower was amazing. Being able to connect with my online items like YouTube was also a bonus. I ca nt wait to stat here again in the future. It was a great stat from beginning to end. No complaints.

Great stay. I had a great stay at the Doubletree in Chandler Az. Hotel seemed brand new and very clean. Rooms were large and bed was very comfortable. Staff was friend lol y and accommodating. I highly recommend this hotel.
